Just an update and correction. I worked out the mei, it wasn't as hard as I=
 initially thought. It reads Sh=F4ji Chikuzen No Daij=F4 Taikai Fuji Naotan=
e with Kao. The Nengo reads Bunsei Gonen Ch=FBshun, Mid spring of 1822 ( I =
had 1823 originally, sorry ) 

So, with that out of the way, my original qu=
estion stands. When were KAO introduced into Mei ?. My original question ws=
 related to swords but it would be interesting to know about kodogu as well=
.

cheers

Rich T
